answers.answer: Hi, how old are you and any history of diabetes? Pins sensations are suggestive of neuropathy which could be due to vitamin B deficiency, low calcium levels, spondylosis causing nerve compression, etc. Brain lesions especially white matter diseases do have similar kind of presentations.
I am black, 41 with diabetes in the family but I have no history
Hi, this could be the complication of diabetes i.e. neuropathy. Try vitamin B preparations for a month or so. Since when you have diabetes  and are you on insulin or tablets?

question: I been sufferring wih pains in my left arm and in my legs but more worried about arm, I had a tempreture and cold sweats, The pain is sharp shooting just a bit worried
title: pins in my left arm
